name: Paper Zombie
description:
A top-down prototype that created by the Construct engine in 2014. Only the endless mode is playable, and the "wave" mode was under development, but the project source files are lost, LOL. 

Goal: 

Kill as many paper zombies as you can within a limited time. Special weapons will spawn and drop on the map, and the clock-like item will increase the timer for extra 5 seconds.

Control:

AWDS: move the player around.

Mouse point: aim the enemies.

Mouse left click: shoot.

The weapon and items will be automatically collected on contact.
